function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate use or non-use of face masks in public spaces","Impact":"Increased transmission of contagious diseases like COVID-19","Mitigation":"Promote and enforce the use of face masks in public places, provide clear guidelines on how to wear them properly","Technologies":"Face recognition technology for monitoring compliance, social distancing apps for reminders","People":"Public, individuals in public spaces","Owner":"Government, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of enforcement of face mask regulations","Impact":"Higher risk of transmission in areas where regulations are not enforced","Mitigation":"Implement strict enforcement of face mask regulations, increase public awareness of the importance of compliance","Technologies":"Surveillance cameras for monitoring, public messaging through social media and broadcasting","People":"Government agencies, law enforcement, public health organizations","Owner":"Government, law enforcement, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Insufficient adoption of face mask use","Impact":"Increase in transmission and spread of contagious diseases","Mitigation":"Campaigns to increase public awareness of the benefits of face masks, provide access to affordable or free face masks","Technologies":"Online platforms for education and distribution, social media campaigns","People":"General public, communities, individuals at higher risk","Owner":"Public health organizations, community leaders, government"}]}
